title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0001
text: What does the 'Serverless Deployment' pattern describe?

options.text: Running microservices as functions managed by a cloud provider

explanation: Serverless deployment runs microservices as functions managed by a cloud provider, abstracting server management.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0002
text: Which of the following is a key characteristic of serverless deployment?
explanation: Serverless platforms automatically scale functions up or down based on incoming requests.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0003
text: Which of the following is a common platform for serverless deployment?
explanation: AWS Lambda is one of the most widely used platforms for serverless deployments.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0004
text: Which of the following best describes the pricing model of serverless computing?
explanation: Serverless computing uses a pay-per-execution model, charging only for actual usage.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0005
text: Which of the following is a benefit of serverless deployment?
explanation: Serverless abstracts infrastructure management, allowing developers to focus on code.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0006
text: Which of the following is a disadvantage of serverless deployment?
explanation: Cold start latency occurs when a function is invoked after being idle, causing a delay.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0007
text: Which of the following is a benefit for scalability?
explanation: Serverless platforms automatically scale functions based on incoming requests.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0008
text: Which of the following is a common use case for serverless deployment?
explanation: Serverless is ideal for event-driven microservices that respond to triggers like HTTP requests or messages.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0009
text: Which of the following is a limitation of serverless deployment?
explanation: Serverless functions have limited execution time, typically a few minutes per invocation.

title: MicroservicesDeploymentServerlessDeployment - Q0010
text: Which of the following is a benefit for cost optimization?
explanation: Serverless billing is based on actual usage, reducing costs for low-traffic workloads.
